patthana22.31:1.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nosaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.31:2.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.31:3.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nooghaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana22.31:5.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ noyogaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana22.31:7.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nonīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana22.31:9.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ noparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
